structuralFindings.rationale: Based on existing specimen classification. New observations from earnings/research session.

quotes.text: We've broken our strategy into a couple key focus areas. We've had a developer platform that we've been working on... The portion we're partnering with Google on is the employee capability.
quotes.speaker: Tracy Kerrins
quotes.speakerTitle: Head of Consumer Technology and Generative AI
quotes.context: Describing Wells Fargo's dual-track AI platform strategy: developer tools vs. employee-facing capabilities

quotes.text: It's not just about the fun and cool stuff... but making sure it is adoptable in financial services.
quotes.speaker: Rohit Bhat
quotes.context: Describing the compliance-first approach to building agentic AI for Wells Fargo

summary: Senior executive redeployed from consumer banking CEO to lead AI scaling: Saul Van Beurden, previously CEO of consumer and small business banking, was reassigned to scale AI across the bank. Kleber Santos (consumer lending CEO) took on expanded responsibilities as co-CEO of Google Agentspace partnership for agentic AI platform: Wells Fargo adopted Google Agentspace to develop custom AI agents. Deep Research and NotebookLM deployed to ~2,000 employees with plans to expand. Early agent use cases: vendor contract review, KYC re 30-35% automation target for engineering and admin tasks: Wells Fargo's restructuring includes a bet that AI can automate 30-35% of its engineering and administrative tasks. Headcount declined 6% to 205,000 by year-end 2025. $612M severance charge in Q4 ($0. Dedicated Head of Consumer Technology and Generative AI role: Tracy Kerrins serves as Head of Consumer Technology and Generative AI, overseeing the agentic AI platform strategy. Kerrins described approach: 'We've broken our strategy into a couple key focus areas
